name: mass_ratio_of_moisture_to_dry_soil
description: The quantity with standard name mass_ratio_of_moisture_to_dry_soil is also known as the water content of a soil or the wet-basis gravimetric moisture content. It is the ratio of the mass of water (liquid and solid) to the mass of the dried sample. The phrase "ratio_of_X_to_Y" means X/Y. It may be expressed as a fraction, a percentage, or any other dimensionless representation of a fraction.
